Long_Description: Type of coal namely lignite, cooking coal and non cooking coal. lignite is the lowest rank of coal due to its relatively low heat content and is used as a fuel for steam-electric power generation. coking coal is a grade of coal that can be used to produce good-quality coke where as coke is an essential fuel in the process of steelmaking. Non cooking is used as thermal coal for power generation. It has a higher ash content and also used in industries like cement, fertilizer, glass, ceramic, paper, chemical and brick manufacturing.
Amount of coal produced quantity in Million Tonnes
